name: Write To Snowflake
input: The Dataframe from the previous node
output: The incoming Dataframe is passed to the next node as it is

fields.name: authType
fields.title: Auth Type
fields.description: Authentication Type. Possible value is OAUTH or USER_CREDENTIAL or KEYPAIR

fields.name: sfWarehouse
fields.title: Snowflake Warehouse
fields.description: Warehouse for connecting to the Snowflake

fields.name: sfDatabase
fields.title: Snowflake Database
fields.description: Database for connecting to the Snowflake

fields.name: sfSchema
fields.title: Snowflake Schema
fields.description: Schema for connecting to the Snowflake

fields.name: dbtable
fields.title: Snowflake Table
fields.description: Snowflake Table from which to write the data

fields.name: columnMapping
fields.title: Column Mapping
fields.description: The connector must map columns from the Spark data frame to the Snowflake table

fields.name: saveMode
fields.title: Save Mode
fields.description: Whether to Append, Overwrite or Error if the table Exists

fields.name: extraOptionsKeys
fields.title: Properties Name
fields.description: Extra options/properites available while executing in WriteToSnowFlake.

fields.name: extraOptionsValues
fields.title: Properties Value
fields.description: Config Values for the Corresponding properites name
